Firedrill looked down at the ground, and kicked a bit of dust over in
contemplation, he then looked at Beachcomber, who nodded in return. He
looked up at the sky, "Well, it was less than a vorn ago....." Firedrill
said.
______________________________________________________________________

*****FLASHBACK******

The quiet skies of Cybertron were filled with the occasional jet engine
roaring by, breaking the silence of the night. It is the year 2271, the
third Cybertronian war has just ended, the Decepticons have scattered to
the far reaches of the Univrese, their army in shambles, their leader
missing, and many of the Decepticon heroes, imprisoned. Their
Descendants, the Predacons, and the Autobots Descendants, the Maximals,
are now living in peace, trying to repair the dammage done, by their
millions of years of conflict, and repairing Cybertron is a long job.
Over the busy Cybertronian Highways, two vehicles of importance can be
noticed. Neither of them are Cybertronian vehicles, they both look out
of place on the highway, as they roar by other vehicles, and take a side
road only allowed to certain authorized personel. "Whoa, slow down
Cliffjumper, your gonna crash dude." the porsh pleaded. 

"No way Jazz, I don't want to be late for this." Cliffjumper said, as he
sped up even more. They both arrived at a toll booth, and the security
gate was in their way. They both screeched to a stop, and Cliffjumper
transformed, then quickly hopped towards the ID area. As he entered his
ID the gate lifted, and the porsh spe by, as Cliffjumper quickly ran
under, then transformed again, and picked up speed to catch up.
